original_text: All the other things that Josiah did while he was king are written in a book. The book is called ‘The history of the kings of Israel and Judah’. It tells how Josiah faithfully obeyed what is written in the Law of the Lord. It includes all the good things that he did, from the beginning to the end of his time as king.
korean_text: 그의 처음부터 끝까지의 행적은 이스라엘과 유다 열왕기에 기록되니라

sentences.original_text: All the other things that Josiah did
while he was king are written in a book
sentences.korean_translation: 왕으로 있을 때 한 일들이 책에 기록되어 있다

sentences.original_text: The book is called 'The history of the kings of Israel and Judah'
sentences.korean_translation: 그 책은 '이스라엘과 유다 왕들의 역사'라고 불린다

sentences.original_text: It tells how Josiah faithfully obeyed
what is written in the Law of the Lord
It includes all the good things that he did
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 행한 모든 좋은 일들을 포함한다

sentences.original_text: from the beginning to the end of his time as king
